sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components"

export const Nav = () => {
    return (
        <NavContainer>
            <TitleContainer>
                <Title>
                    TODD AUSTIN
                </Title>
                <Beacon>
                </Beacon>
            </TitleContainer>
            <NavItemsContainer>
                <NavItem>
                    <NavBeacon />
                    RESEARCH
                </NavItem>
                <NavItem>
                    <NavBeacon />
                    AUSTIN-LAB
                </NavItem>
                <NavItem>
                    <NavBeacon />
                    NEWS
                </NavItem>
                <NavItem>
                    <NavBeacon />
                    TEACHING
                </NavItem>
            </NavItemsContainer>
            <DarkModeContainer>
                DARK MODE
            </DarkModeContainer>
        </NavContainer>
    )
}

const NavContainer = styled.div({
    border: "1px solid red",
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "row",
    justifyContent: "space-between",
    alignItems: "center",
    height: 50,
    padding: "0px 20px"


})

const TitleContainer = styled.div({
    // border: "1px solid black",
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "column",
    alignItems: "end",
    cursor: "pointer"


})
const Title = styled.div({
    // border: "1px solid red",
    fontFamily: "Gotham ",
    fontSize: "115%",
    fontWeight: 600

})
const Beacon = styled.div({
    backgroundColor: "#ff7055",
    height: 5,
    width: 15


})

const NavItemsContainer = styled.div({
    border: "1px solid red",
    fontFamily: "Gotham Light",
    fontSize: "95%",
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "row",
    justifyContent: "space-around",
    width: "50%",
    height: 30
    // fontWeight: "bold"

})

const NavItem = styled.div({
    border: "1px solid green",
    // margin: "0% 20%"
    // fontWeight: "bold"

})
const NavBeacon = styled.div({
    backgroundColor: "#ff7055",
    height: 3,
    width: 15


})

const DarkModeContainer = styled.div({
    border: "1px solid red",
    fontFamily: "Gotham",
    fontSize: "115%",

    // fontWeight: "bold"

})
